giftAidPayments.description: An object containing Gift Aid payments made to charities for the specified tax year.

totalAmount.description: The total amount of Gift Aid payments made for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

oneOffAmount.description: The amount of one-off Gift Aid payments made for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amountTreatedAsPreviousTaxYear.description: The amount of Gift Aid payments made within the specified tax year that should be treated as if they were made in the previous tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

amountTreatedAsSpecifiedTaxYear.description: The amount of Gift Aid payments brought forward from the following tax year, treated as if made in the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

gifts.description: An object containing gifts made to charities for the specified tax year.

landAndBuildings.description: The value of land and buildings gifted to charity for the specified tax year. This should include any costs of the gift or sale, such as legal or valuer's fees. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

sharesOrSecurities.description: The value of shares or securities gifted to charity for the specified tax year. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource
